alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of northern Portage, northwestern Trumbull, Geauga, east central Cuyahoga and southwestern Ashtabula Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking these thunderstorms over South Russell, or 13 miles southwest of Chardon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...This heavy rainfall will be occurring where 1 to 2 inches of rain has already fallen last night. As a result, expect ponding of water on roadways, especially in urban areas. Locations impacted include... Solon, South Russell, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Burton, West Farmington, Bristolville, Aurora, Parkman, Chagrin Falls, Huntsburg, Reminderville, Orange, Moreland Hills, Claridon, Hartsgrove, Hiram, Bentleyville and Bainbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized water issues. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
